comment: Excuse me, Senator Sherrod Brown's Ex-Wife presented medical records, Brown violated a restraining order issued by the court & threatened his wife during their divorce.. He's been a pimple on the ass of Ohio for over damn years...

                                          :op2 "Brown")
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91

                              :ARG2 (w / wife)
                              :time (e2 / ex)))
                  :ARG1 (r / record
                        :mod (m2 / medicine)))
            :op2 (v / violate-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 (o / order-01
                        :ARG2 (r2 / restrain-01)
                        :ARG1-of (ii2 / issue-01
                              :ARG0 (c / court))))
            :op3 (t / threaten-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG2 (p4 / person

                              :ARG1 p3
                              :ARG2 (w2 / wife)))
                  :time (d / divorce-01

                        :ARG1 p4)))
      :snt3 (p5 / pimple
            :location (a2 / ass
                  :part-of (s2 / state
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Ohio")))
            :duration (o2 / over
                  :op1 (y2 / year
                        :mod (d2 / damn)))))
